structure.unit: Inspection And Regulation Of, And Licenses For, Buildings, Elevators And Cinematographs

law.catch_line: Suspension And Revocation Of License; Appeal
law.text: An operatorâ€™s license may be suspended or revoked for cause at any time by an inspector; but the person whose license is so suspended or revoked may appeal to the commissioner of public safety, whose decision in the matter shall be final.
